title: How silver "smurfs" get a main.
body:
This is the story of the avarage smurf in silver.

There once was a boy named jimmy. Jimmy got placed in the Silver league. JImmy decided to rank up his ELO by playing some games, but he seemed to lose everygame. Jimmy got frustrated. He started blaming his team for the losses.

He decided to take up the offer of an ELO booster. After 3 weeks he were in Platinum 4.
Jimmy was excited.
He decided to join a game, thinking: "surely now my team wont loose the game for me!".
Everything were going well, but then Jimmy died. And he died. Again... and again. Jimmy got mad once again. He decided to level up a new account, a "smurf" so to say. He got placed in silver once again.

Now when people call him a noob and baddie he simply replies: Lol! I'm just trolling! My main is fucking platinum 4 you noobs, enjoy your low ELO haha!

Presented by QUrak, Stuck in Elo Hell.

replies.body: I'm a wood five smurf, does this story still apply?

>
> until his main decays...

his main wont decay in plat...
